page.title: 15LANDSCAPE
page.content: ON THIS SECOND PAGE UNDER THE TITLE "LANDSCAPE",WE WILL LOOK AT"FEATURES". THE RIVER WEAVER IS ONE OF THE MAJOR FEATURES OF THE NORTHWICH BLOCK.THE LARGE POOL WHERE THE TRIBUTARY OF THE RIVER DANE MEETS THE MAIN RIVER IS THE LOCATION FOR WATER ACTIVITIES SUCH AS RAFT RACES ON CERTAIN DAYS OF THE YEAR.THE RIVER BANKS HAVE BEEN IMPROVED CONSIDERABLY TO PROVIDE PLEASANT WALKING AND RECREATIONAL AREAS. JUST TO THE SIDE OF THE CONFLUENCE OF THE TWO RIVERS IS THE CENTRE OF NORTHWICH,AN AREA KNOWN AS THE "BULL RING".ALTHOUGH DOMINATED BY BANKS AND BUILDING SOCIETIES,THE MAIN FEATURES ARE THE BUILDINGS THEMSELVES.THEY ARE HALF-TIMBERED,BLACK AND WHITE BUILDINGS,AND ALTHOUGH THEY ARE NOT AS OLD AS THEY LOOK,THEY PROVIDE A GREAT DEAL OF CHARACTER TO THE TOWN.
